EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_10AM Spring Security Authentication with Spring Boot.Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Reminder: Spring Security Authentication... with Spring Boot and More!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Thank you for registering for today's webinar Spring Security Authentication... with Spring Boot and More! on Thursday, March 10, 2016.
Please see event details below:
Date: Thursday, March 10, 2016 Time: 10:00AM PST
Join the Session <[[http://event.on24.com/wcc/r/1148209/7850483488D8C2AA85B51758F453AD14]]> Audio Information: This webinar will be streaming live via your computer speakers.
We look forward to you joining us!
